title: upachaaramulanu
sahitya:
upacAramulanu cEkonavayya uragarAja shayana

anupallavi

 capala kOTi nibhAmbara dhara shrI jAnakIpati daya cEsi nADu

caraNam 1

 kapaTa nATaka sUtra dhArivai kAmita phalamu losagE rAma
aparimita navaratnamulu poDigina aparanji gODugu nIkE tagunayya
   
caraNam 2

 merupu tigala rItini merasE karaku bangAru kAda lamarina 
sharadindu dhyuti samAnamau cAmara yugamulu nIkE tagunayya
   
caraNam 3

 jAjulu sampangulu mruvamu vira kuruvEru vAsanalanu virAja 
mAnamagu vyajanamu tyAgarAja vinuta nIkE tagunayya
